channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Whole road surface in an unsafe condition, 21st August
item.description:
The whole of Bayshill Road, but particularly approaching and over the pedestrian crossing is a terrible surface for cycling and needs to be completely resurfaced for both safety and comfort.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Bayshill Road, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 21st August
item.description:
Overgrown Hedge FW 8m x 1m Give and take TM With Temporary FW Closure Near pole 46 Cut back from FW (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road marking need to be redone, 21st August
item.description:
Road marking outside the property need to be reinstated/redone Road markings were a yellow criss-cross box and the words KEEP CLEAR The first four houses have a no parking zig zag lines but there are none at the following four houses this means that members of the public park in front of the driveways (local school in the area)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Glynrosa Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 21st August
item.description:
Email received 19/08/2025 - copy attached. Customer reports that they believe somebody has tampered with the signage at the location - it is askew.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Overgrown trees, 21st August
item.description:
Outside number 6 and 8 Sentinel Way, trees are overgrown into the road and over the pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sentinel Way, Hucclecote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes on pavement, 21st August
item.description:
The pavement outside 14 arkle close is a trip hazard as there are many potholes . The home owner is registered visually impaired.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Arkle Close, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 x car seats flytipped on Open Space opposite 65 Sandyleaze, 21st August
item.description:
2 x car seats to be collected by Ubico. They have been deposited opposite 65 Sandyleaze, at the entrance to old Richians rugby club.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakleaze, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Flytipping (not witnessed and no evidence likely)

item.title: Many potholes in arkle close turning point, 21st August
item.description:
There are many potholes at the turning point berween12 and 14 arkle close. The home owner of 14 arkle close is registered as visually impaired .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Arkle Close, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 21st August
item.description:
Constant water flow on CW Severn Trent have investigated but said it is not a broken pipe or sewer. Suspect blocked drain or spring, Water is flowing though drain further up CW. Can this please be passed on to the relevant AHR for further investigation of the cause of the water. Temporary repair raised for pothole outside the property
Report on FixMyStreet
